AAK.caption: From
AAK.doc: Sender number - may contain a maximum of 11 alphanumeric or 16 numeric characters.
AAK.name: from

AAL.caption: Text
AAL.doc: Up to 1520 characters - If more than 160 characters are used, the text is distributed over several messages, each SMS is calculated individually.
AAL.name: text

AAM.caption: To
AAM.doc: Recipient number – possible are numbers and address book entries (groups and contacts). Multiple recipients can be specified separated by commas.
AAM.name: to

AAN.caption: Debug
AAN.doc: If activated no SMS will be sent or calculated.
AAN.name: debug

AAO.caption: Delay
AAO.doc: Specify a custom point of time for time-delayed SMS.
AAO.name: delay

AAP.caption: No Reload Lock
AAP.doc: Switch off reload lock. This lock prevents the sending of the same SMS (text, type and recipient alike) within 180 seconds.
AAP.name: no_reload

AAQ.caption: Flash
AAQ.doc: Send as Flash SMS. These are displayed directly in the receiver’s display. Flash SMS do not show sender names, except on some older phone models.
AAQ.name: flash

AAR.caption: Time To Live
AAR.doc: Specifies the validity period of the SMS in minutes.
AAR.name: ttl

AAS.caption: Label
AAS.doc: You can optionally set a separate label for each SMS so that you can assign it to your statistics. Max. 100 chars, allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, .-_@.
AAS.name: label

AAT.caption: Performance Tracking
AAT.doc: Enable Performance Tracking for URLs found in the message text.
AAT.name: performance_tracking

AAU.caption: Foreign ID
AAU.doc: Provide your own data for this message. You will get the foreign_id returned in DLR callbacks etc. Max. 64 chars, allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, .-_@.
AAU.name: foreign_id
